items.text: overpitched on off stump, and this time DK clears his back leg and swings through the ball's line to long off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Karthik, 1 run

items.text: full on leg stump, and he works this  - with the spin - to square leg off the front foot
items.postText: DG: "@Ayush: What do you mean slow? The last 5 overs, they have scored at 4.4, which is very close to RRR. Pragmatic approach?"
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dhoni, no run

items.preText: Sagar: "Half the overs. Half the runs."
items.text: full on middle, and he goes onto the back foot, before working the ball off his pads to square leg
flighted full on middle stump, and Dhoni whips this off his toes to the leg side. Placed into the gap between deep midwicket and wide long on, and the ball races away for another boundary!
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Dhoni, FOUR runs

items.text: full just outside off, and Dhoni uses his feet to Nazmul once again. Toe-ends the drive to long off on this occasion
items.postText: Tom de Sailor: "Its good that India's middle order is being tested in a high pressure situation like this. Bodes well for India's preparation for the world cup. The one who stands up and wins it for India today will be on the flight to England. "

items.text: full just outside off, and DK pushes at it with the bat's open face. Tapped to cover point
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Karthik, no run

items.text: full on middle, and DK comes down the wicket. Whips this off his toes to the leg side, but plays it square to the fielder in the deep

items.preText: AK: "cricinfo seems to be forwarding my Dhoni bashing comments to Dhoni. He is responding...!!"
items.text: full outside off, and spinning away after pitching. Cut with soft hands to the fielder in the deep
length ball on off stump, and skidding through. The ball stays low too, and Dhoni mistimes to cover
length ball on middle, but going down leg. Dhoni tries to paddle this fine, but misses. Sharp take from the keeper and he appeals for caught behind, but the umpire isn't falling for that
length ball wide outside off. Dhoni throws his hands at it, and cuts square to point

overpitched on middle stump, and he taps this to mid on. No single there, but the fielder has a throw at the non-striker's. Mahmudullah isn't backing up, and neither is the man at cover. Misfield on the overthrow means India finally take the single
length ball on middle, and he pulls this along the ground to deep midwicket. Struck well
full just outside off, and comfortably driven to wide long off for a walking single
length ball on off, and angling into the batsman. DK makes room, and punches off the back foot to long off
full outside off, and spinning away. Driven off the front foot to wide long off for a single
full just outside off, and he opens the bat's face on this occasion. Pushed past cover point
full just outside off. Turns after pitching, and DK defends with soft hands
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Karthik, no run

items.text: full on leg, and Karthik uses his feet before clipping it to wide long on for a walking single

items.preText: Vishal Pawar: "Looks like nobody noticed it, the target is already below 100."
items.text: overpitched on off, and Dhoni leans forward to convert the delivery into a full toss. Driven past cover's right to wide long off once again
good length just outside off, and straightens after pitching. Cut off the back foot to cover, who does well to collect the ball despite an awkward bounce
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Karthik, no run

items.text: full on off, and Dhoni checks his shot after walking down the ground. Eventually works it off his pads to the leg side
full just outside off. Defended with soft hands as he offers the bat's full face
overpitched on leg stump. DK is quick to get down on one knee, and he sweeps it fine past the fielder inside the circle! Fifty partnership
full outside off, and spinning into DK. Defended towards cover
